Package com.nitnelave.CreeperHeal.block

  • Interface Summary 
    Interface Description
    Replaceable
    Interface for replaceable items (blocks, paintings, ...).
  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    BlockId
    A utility class to represent a block type along with optional data.
    BurntBlockManager
    Manager to handle the burnt blocks.
    CreeperArmorStand
    Represents an ArmorStand
    CreeperBanner
    Banner implementation of CreeperBlock.
    CreeperBlock
    Represents a block that can be replaced.
    CreeperBurntBlock
    This class represents a burnt block.
    CreeperButton  
    CreeperExplosion
    Represents an explosion, with the list of blocks destroyed, the time of the explosion, and the radius.
    CreeperHanging
    Represents a hanging, i.e.
    CreeperStone  
    DelayReplacement
    This class is a task to replace a CreeperBlock later.
    ExplodedBlockManager
    Manager for the explosions list and the explosion index.
    FallIndex
    Handle the map for the blocks prevented from falling.
    NeighborBlock
    Represents a possibly dependent neighbor block.
    NeighborChest
    Represents the second part of a double chest, the first one being a CreeperChest.
    RailsIndex
    Contains and manages the list of rails whose update should be prevented.
    ReplacementTimer
    Utility for all entities whose replacement is timed.
    ToReplaceList
    Class to handle the blocks to be replaced immediately.
